title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama. Chat, generate, embed; sync & async clients.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama. Works in Node & modern browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models (chat, generate, embeddings).

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user).

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: GitHub Copilot-style VS Code extension powered by local Ollama models.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with POJO model mapping.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for interacting with the Ollama HTTP API.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app template that connects to local Ollama instances.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators & embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image and docker-compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA, ROCm).

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-nvidia
summary: NVIDIA Jetson & CUDA optimized Ollama builds with TensorRT-LLM patches.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings Ollama completions into channels/DMs.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to run local LLM prompts on selected notes or selections.

title: ollama-logseq
summary: LogSeq plugin that adds /ollama slash command for AI-assisted writing.

title: ollama-macos-swift
summary: SwiftUI sample app for macOS that wraps Ollama REST API with native UI.
